name: Sunvale
description:
Sunvale is a showcase of an immersive environment. Players can explore the town, speak with characters, engage in quests, and learn more about the inhabitants. You'll quickly find yourself in a world of trouble for stealing a holy vase from a sacred temple.

The purpose of this project was to demonstrate how small details go a long way in building the believability of a space. Conversations between characters looks to mimic the Witcher series through camera transitions, animations, and dialogue.

Controls

WASD to move

Space to interact

Left click for dialogue selection
